narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 7-year-old female was last seen at Richmond at 2025-10-03T21:56:54.488488+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to arrive at school.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 12 hours of disappearance, movement cues merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond suggest travel southbound along US-29. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Richmond, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 5 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (7-year-old female, wearing denim jacket, khaki shorts, red Crocs) near Grayson.

provenance._fulltext: A 7-year-old female was last seen at Richmond at 2025-10-03T21:56:54.488488+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to arrive at school. Within 12 hours of disappearance, movement cues merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond suggest travel southbound along US-29. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Richmond, Virginia. Around 5 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (7-year-old female, wearing denim jacket, khaki shorts, red Crocs) near Grayson.
